The Cohiba Mini Limited Edition 2021 is the ideal cigar for a quick tasting experience exalting all the excellence of the Cohiba taste. This cigarillo offers sweetness combined with intense aromas, despite its small diameter. Cohiba Mini Limited Edition 2021 are 80 mm long cigarillos. Allow 5 to 15 minutes to enjoy this cigarillo.
